Package com.example.expensetracker.Adapters

Class CategoryAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CategoryAdapter.CategoryViewHolder>
com.example.expensetracker.Adapters.CategoryAdapter
public class CategoryAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CategoryAdapter.CategoryViewHolder>
CategoryAdapter is a RecyclerView.Adapter that displays a list of Category objects.

    Class

    static interface
